gameframework.particles.behaviors

Class GravityParticleBehavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameframework.particles.behaviors.ParticleBehavior
      • gameframework.particles.behaviors.GravityParticleBehavior

  • public class GravityParticleBehavior
extends ParticleBehavior
    This behavior applies a gravitational force to every particle So it will gradually increase the y position of every particle

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GravityParticleBehavior(ParticleBehavior behavior, double minGravity, double maxGravity)
      Constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Will apply gravity to the particle

    • Constructor Detail

      • GravityParticleBehavior

        public GravityParticleBehavior(ParticleBehavior behavior,
                               double minGravity,
                               double maxGravity)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        behavior - Particle's behavior
        minGravity - Minimum strength of the gravity
        maxGravity - Maximum strength of the gravity minGravity and maxGravity represent a range. That way, each particle has a random value chosen in that range If you want every particle to have the same gravity strength, just set minGravity and maxGravity to the same value

    • Method Detail

        Will apply gravity to the particle

        update in class ParticleBehavior
        Parameters:
        particle - Particle to update
